card: My competency as a cognitive scientist is to use knowledge about the clockwork of the mind and the human-computer interaction to design technological tools (web pages, applications, equipment or systems). This way I can design technological tools maximizing their usability (for example minimizing the cognitive load or stimulating the memory) specifically for its target group.

utbildning.title: Education
utbildning.description: I have recently concluded my studies in cognitive science at the University of Linköping. My carreer togeather with the free courses i've carried out involve the following:
courses: Cognitive Science - cognitive abilities I and II
Interaction, design and usability I, II, III, IV
Research methods - Qualitative and Quantitative methods
Webb development - front end with Javascript

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: I intentionally did not put 100 precent expertise in any of the present skills since these programs and languages are improving constantly, and beside all the programs and languages  I master, the best skill I can show you is to search for the solving of problems related to these programs or languages on the internet.

javaScript.name: JavaScript

pairWords.name: Pair the words
pairWords.description: This was my first project with JavaScript before I took a course att the university.
pairWords.alt: This sections shows a game That I programmed while I self-learned JavaScript.

javaScript.gameMessage: This 'game' was designed for bigger screens.

webCv.name: web CV
webCv.description: This project was made to show what I can do.

schoolApp.name: SchoolApp
schoolApp.description: SchoolApp is a school-browser. It uses Google Maps, Google Geocoding and Skolverkets API.

mindtemp.name: Mindtemp
mindtemp.description: This project deals with the design of Mindtemps webbsite. It is a complete makeover of their old website in which i have the responsibility of the graphic design, the structure and the UX/UI

qrawler.name: Qrawler sanctions report filler
qrawler.description: In this project I develop a system to monitor tradings in order to do not infringe international sanctions.

thesis.name: Bachellor's Thesis
thesis.description: My thesis is a research in which I focus on how interaction with a computer affect learning new words in a second language.

arbetsformedlingen.name: Arbetsformedlingen
arbetsformedlingen.description: The project with Arbetsformedlingen is a research to find out which factors affect the job searcher’s decision to apply for a job.
